FuncDef: This command defines the remote IP address to be assigned to the far-end of the associated PPP/MLPPP link via IPCP extensions. This command is only applicable if the associated SAP/port is a PPP/MLPPP interface with an IPCP encapsulation.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a unicast IPv4 address to be signaled to the far-end of the associated PPP/MLPPP link by IPCP extensions.
